files.template:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata: { name: app }
spec:
  scaleTargetRef: { apiVersion: apps/v1, kind: Deployment, name: app }
  minReplicas: 1
  maxReplicas: 3
  metrics: [{ type: Resource, resource: { name: cpu, target: { type: Utilization, averageUtilization: 50 } } }]
